ComicInfo.Summary:
Sally and her Chief take on notorious Nazi spy The Owl only to have Sally captured. She is saved by undercover FBI agent Elisa.
Dan is hired by Tayna to bodyguard her boyfriend, Len. After several false leads and Len's death, it is determined that Tayna killed Greg and meant to use Dan as the alibi
Polly is wounded by Pancho. Jean is captured and stripped by Pancho and his men when she tries to rescue Polly
In search of a legendary diamond mine, Diana is captured by the Kappirs tribe and is rescued by a knight from the days of the Crusades name Prince.
After being saved by Prince Baldwin, they are attacked by the Black Knight. Baldwin is killed and Diana is stripped naked and captured. She escapes and is saved by Ted Morton from the Knights.
After rescuing Diana, Ted is killed by a jealous ape. She is saved from the ape by some Pygmies and whom have her taken to be sacrificed to the god Taku. She is saved by a raiding party from Dr. Ramski.
The Chief is captured and tortured by members of 'De Gang'. Sally has Peanuts go and call for the Police and she goes to save him herself, but is captured. Both are about to be knifed when the police arrive & shoot Spike to death and rest are captured
Posing as a cloak model, Sally finds that Lisa has been the one behind the poisonings of Mr Gluntz's models due to her jealousy of them.
Sally acts as a decoy to capture a homicidal maniac who has killed three girls in two weeks and dropped them in the cemetery. With Peanuts help, her ploy works and The Chief kills the murderer.
ComicInfo.Writer: Adolphe Barreaux,Joseph Szokoli,Robert Leslie Bellem,Robert Maxwell,Clayton Maxwell,Adolphe Barreaux,Robert Leslie Bellem,Joseph Szokoli,Clayton Maxwell
ComicInfo.Title: Winning Her Stripes; Murder With Music; Into the Net!; Underground Peril; Crimson Menace; Murder Mania
